text: Monterey Park is a city in the western San Gabriel Valley region of Los Angeles County, California in the Los Angeles metropolitan area, United States. It is about from Los Angeles., http://www.distance- cities.com/search?from=monterey+park+&to;=Downtown%2C+Los+Angeles%2C+CA%2C+United+States&country;=us In the 2020 Census, the city had a total population of 61,096. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California
title: Monterey Park, California
